Description.Text:
Property Location
Villa San Michele is centrally located in Port Douglas, walking distance from St Mary's by the Sea Chapel and close to Marina Mirage. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of Sugar Wharf and Anzac Park.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 40 air-conditioned rooms featuring kitchenettes with refrigerators and stovetops. Your room comes with a pillowtop bed. Rooms have private balconies. 26-inch LCD televisions with cable programming provide entertainment, while complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Enjoy recreation amenities such as a spa tub or take in the view from a garden. Additional amenities include complimentary wireless Internet access, tour/ticket assistance, and barbecue grills.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include luggage storage and laundry facilities. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and free self parking is available onsite.


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 10 AM

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.

Villa San Michele is centrally located in Port Douglas, walking distance from St Mary's by the Sea Chapel and close to Marina Mirage. This 4-star resort is within close proximity of Sugar Wharf and Anzac Park.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

St Mary's by the Sea Chapel - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Marina Mirage - 0.5 km / 0.3 mi
Sugar Wharf - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Anzac Park - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
Four Mile Beach Park - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Wildlife Habitat - 4.8 km / 3 mi
Mossman Gorge Center - 12.3 km / 7.6 mi
Mossman Gorge - 12.9 km / 8 mi
Daintree Rainforest - 14.5 km / 9 mi

The preferred airport for Villa San Michele is Cairns, QLD (CNS-Cairns Intl.) - 53.5 km / 33.2 mi.

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.
  • Minimum Spring Break check-in age is 18 years old.
